Àtụ:Infobox dam
ọdọ mmiri Kouga  bụ nnukwu mmiri dị n'Osimiri Kouga ihe dị ka  iri abụọ na otu  (iri na atọ mi) n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Patensie dị na ebe akporo Kouga Local Municipality, na  Ndịda Afrịka Ọ na-enye mmiri, ịgba mmiri na ndagwurugwu Kouga na Gamtoos yana mmiri ọṅụṅụ na mpaghara nke Port Elizabeth site na Loerie Balancing Dam. E wuru ya n'etiti afọ 1957 na 1969.
Enwere ike ịbanye n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ site na ịgbaso R330 na R331 site na N2 na nke Humansdorp
Ihe niile ma e wezụga kilomita asatọ ikpeazụ (5.0 mi) bụ okporo ụzọ nke tarred ma enwere obere ọwa n'ihu mgbidi mmiri ahụ.
A kpọrọ ya Paul Sauer Dam n'aha Paul Sauer, mana a gbanwere aha ya na afọ 1995.
E nwere ọnụ Ọgụgụ atọ nke 1200 kVA nke bụ hydroelectric turbines a bekee  na ala nke mmiri ahụ, mana ha anaghị eji ha eme ihe ugbu a.
